code:
export const setToken=token=>{if(token){localStorage.setItem('jwtToken',token);}else{localStorage.removeItem('jwtToken');}};export const getToken=()=>{return localStorage.getItem('jwtToken');};export const isTokenExpired=token=>{if(!token)return true;const payload=JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));return payload.exp*1000<Date.now();};// Add this to the bottom of the file
export const removeToken=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('jwtToken');};
